alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 4:11PM MST until January 12 at 9:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds overnight will remain near 30 mph with temperatures dipping into the single digits.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
